content:
Anna Tahovská (CLAIRE Office, CZ) said:

Do you want to learn more about CLAIRE Covid19 Initiative, the people who stand behind it and their work?
Watch the first two interviews in CLAIRE Covid19 Initiative: Meet the Team Leaders video series:
Emanuela Girardi: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CA8oRUo-0iw&list=PL0pCnfHLkA780knGyHqwiji_3AW2jNTBH&index=1&t=6s
Davide Bacciu: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=H6iypuk9Ibs&t=11s

You can also look forward to the interviews with Ann Nowé, Jose Sousa and other Topic Leaders from this Initiative. Stay tuned! :soon: :mobile_phone:

Anna Tahovská (CLAIRE Office, CZ) said:

:movie_camera: Third video in CLAIRE Covid19 Initiative: Meet the Team Leaders video series is live now!
Enjoy the interview with Ann Nowé and her take on how AI can help desicision makers while tackling the current crisis: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=j90BI5AQMzU

:soon: :mobile_phone: More videos are coming - Jose Sousa, Marco Maratea and others will soon share their experience working in CLAIRE Covid19 Initiative.

Alexa Kodde (CLAIRE Headquarters, NL) said:

Resource management, planning, scheduling - these are some of the things AI can help with while dealing with pandemics Electric light bulb How? Watch Marco Maratea from CLAIRE Covid19 Initiative share his insight about this topic :point_right: https://youtu.be/rb7wz7IRhRY
